    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int paneWidth,
             int paneHeight,
             boolean white,
             Player player)
        Initializes Enemy's coordinates so that Player and Enemy will not be initialized on the same position.
        Parameters:
        paneWidth - width of Scene
        paneHeight - height of Scene
        white - boolean value, expressed whether enemy is white,
        player - the Player instance

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates Enemy position. Enemy chases player. Moves animal to the left/right/left/down so that enemy doesn't go behind the Playground borders.
        Overrides:
        update in class Animal
